feed.title: Your awesome title
feed.subtitle: Write an awesome description for your new site here. You can edit this line in _config.yml. It will appear in your document head meta (for Google search results) and in your feed.xml site description.

entry.title: PlainInbox
entry.content: PlainInbox is a generalization of PlainEmail to arbitrary SMTP mailservers. The application provides a new kind of workflow that treats your inbox as a stack, reducing distraction while you process each piece of mail thrown your way.
entry.summary: PlainInbox is a generalization of PlainEmail to arbitrary SMTP mailservers. The application provides a new kind of workflow that treats your inbox as a stack, reducing distraction while you process each piece of mail thrown your way.
